headline: Corning Inc (GLW) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Growth in Optical Communications and ...
summary: Corning Inc (GLW) reports a 13% revenue increase and a 42% EPS surge, driven by robust demand in key segments despite challenges in automotive and life sciences.
